comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Sâlih ash-Sharîf at-Tûnisî (about 1869 in Tunis - 1920 in Lausanne) (according to "Sâlih ash-Sharîf at-Tûnisî, a North African nationalist in Berlin during the first world war", by Peter Heine, www.persee.fr/web/revues/home/prescript/article/remmm_003...) Evening public ledger., January 08, 1916, Night Extra, Image 1 reported that 'Sheik Saleh' denounced French rule in northern Africa at a great Arab demonstration in Berlin on January 7, 1916 (this event is mentioned in the treatise of Peter Heine as well, page 92).
